dict.string: This template builds a "fake" static iOS framework. Building "Universal Framework" will produce "<configuration>-universal/<your framework>" in your build folder.

# Assume the target name is the same as the project name UFW_TARGET=${PROJECT}
if [ -z ${SDK_NAME} ]; then # Use the latest iphoneos SDK available UFW_GREP_RESULT=$(xcodebuild -showsdks | grep -o "iphoneos.*$") while read -r line; do UFW_SDK_VERSION="${line}" done <<< "${UFW_GREP_RESULT}" else # Use the SDK specified by XCode UFW_SDK_VERSION="${SDK_NAME}" fi
UFW_SDK_VERSION=$(echo "${UFW_SDK_VERSION}" | grep -o "[0-9].*$") UFW_FMWK_DIRNAME="${UFW_TARGET}.framework" UFW_EMBEDDED_DIRNAME="${UFW_TARGET}.embeddedframework" UFW_EXE_PATH="${UFW_FMWK_DIRNAME}/${UFW_TARGET}" UFW_IPHONE_DIR="${BUILD_DIR}/${CONFIGURATION}-iphoneos" UFW_SIMULATOR_DIR="${BUILD_DIR}/${CONFIGURATION}-iphonesimulator" UFW_UNIVERSAL_DIR="${BUILD_DIR}/${CONFIGURATION}-universal"
# Build Framework
rm -rf "${UFW_UNIVERSAL_DIR}"
xcodebuild -target "${UFW_TARGET}" -configuration ${CONFIGURATION} -sdk iphoneos${UFW_SDK_VERSION} BUILD_DIR=${BUILD_DIR} CONFIGURATION_TEMP_DIR=${CONFIGURATION_TEMP_DIR} clean build if [ "$?" != "0" ]; then echo >&2 "Error: xcodebuild failed"; exit 1; fi xcodebuild -target "${UFW_TARGET}" -configuration ${CONFIGURATION} -sdk iphonesimulator${UFW_SDK_VERSION} BUILD_DIR=${BUILD_DIR} CONFIGURATION_TEMP_DIR=${CONFIGURATION_TEMP_DIR} clean build if [ "$?" != "0" ]; then echo >&2 "Error: xcodebuild failed"; exit 1; fi
if [ ! -f "${UFW_IPHONE_DIR}/${UFW_EXE_PATH}" ]; then echo "Framework target \"${UFW_TARGET}\" had no source files to build from. Make sure your source files have the correct target membership" exit 1 fi
mkdir -p "${UFW_UNIVERSAL_DIR}" if [ "$?" != "0" ]; then echo >&2 "Error: mkdir failed"; exit 1; fi
cp -a "${UFW_IPHONE_DIR}/${UFW_FMWK_DIRNAME}" "${UFW_UNIVERSAL_DIR}/${UFW_FMWK_DIRNAME}" if [ "$?" != "0" ]; then echo >&2 "Error: cp failed"; exit 1; fi
lipo -create -output "${UFW_UNIVERSAL_DIR}/${UFW_EXE_PATH}" "${UFW_IPHONE_DIR}/${UFW_EXE_PATH}" "${UFW_SIMULATOR_DIR}/${UFW_EXE_PATH}" if [ "$?" != "0" ]; then echo >&2 "Error: lipo failed"; exit 1; fi
# Build standard framework structure
mkdir -p "${UFW_UNIVERSAL_DIR}/${UFW_FMWK_DIRNAME}/Versions/A/Resources" if [ "$?" != "0" ]; then echo >&2 "Error: mkdir failed"; exit 1; fi
cd "${UFW_UNIVERSAL_DIR}/${UFW_FMWK_DIRNAME}" if [ "$?" != "0" ]; then echo >&2 "Error: cd failed"; exit 1; fi
mv "${UFW_TARGET}" "Versions/A/" if [ "$?" != "0" ]; then echo >&2 "Error: mv failed"; exit 1; fi
mkdir -p Headers if [ "$?" != "0" ]; then echo >&2 "Error: mkdir failed"; exit 1; fi
mv "Headers" "Versions/A/" if [ "$?" != "0" ]; then echo >&2 "Error: mv failed"; exit 1; fi
UFW_RESOURCE_LIST=$(ls) while read -r filename; do if [ "${filename}" != "Versions" ]; then mv "${filename}" "Versions/A/Resources/" if [ "$?" != "0" ]; then echo >&2 "Error: mv failed"; exit 1; fi fi done <<< "${UFW_RESOURCE_LIST}"
cd Versions if [ "$?" != "0" ]; then echo >&2 "Error: cd failed"; exit 1; fi
ln -s A Current if [ "$?" != "0" ]; then echo >&2 "Error: ln failed"; exit 1; fi
cd .. if [ "$?" != "0" ]; then echo >&2 "Error: cd failed"; exit 1; fi
ln -s "Versions/Current/${UFW_TARGET}" if [ "$?" != "0" ]; then echo >&2 "Error: ln failed"; exit 1; fi
ln -s "Versions/Current/Headers" if [ "$?" != "0" ]; then echo >&2 "Error: ln failed"; exit 1; fi
ln -s "Versions/Current/Resources" if [ "$?" != "0" ]; then echo >&2 "Error: ln failed"; exit 1; fi
# Build Embedded Framework
mkdir -p "${UFW_UNIVERSAL_DIR}/${UFW_EMBEDDED_DIRNAME}/Resources" if [ "$?" != "0" ]; then echo >&2 "Error: mkdir failed"; exit 1; fi
cp -a "${UFW_UNIVERSAL_DIR}/${UFW_FMWK_DIRNAME}" "${UFW_UNIVERSAL_DIR}/${UFW_EMBEDDED_DIRNAME}/" if [ "$?" != "0" ]; then echo >&2 "Error: cp failed"; exit 1; fi
cd "${UFW_UNIVERSAL_DIR}/${UFW_FMWK_DIRNAME}/Resources" if [ "$?" != "0" ]; then echo >&2 "Error: cd failed"; exit 1; fi
UFW_RESOURCE_LIST=$(ls)
cd "${UFW_UNIVERSAL_DIR}/${UFW_EMBEDDED_DIRNAME}/Resources" if [ "$?" != "0" ]; then echo >&2 "Error: cd failed"; exit 1; fi
while read -r filename; do if [ "${filename}" != "Info.plist" ]; then ln -s "../${UFW_FMWK_DIRNAME}/Resources/${filename}" if [ "$?" != "0" ]; then echo >&2 "Error: link failed"; exit 1; fi fi done <<< "${UFW_RESOURCE_LIST}"
